summary.span: 表示对象的先进先出集合。

span.span: Represents a first-in, first-out collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类将队列实现为循环数组。This class implements a queue as a circular array. 存储在 中的对象将在一端插入并从另一个中删除。Objects stored in a are inserted at one end and removed from the other. > [!IMPORTANT] > 建议不要将 `Queue` 类用于新的开发。We don't recommend that you use the `Queue` class for new development. 相反，我们建议使用泛型 类。Instead, we recommend that you use the generic class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 GitHub 上[不应使用非泛型集合](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md)。For more information, see [Non-generic collections shouldn't be used](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md) on GitHub. 如果需要临时存储信息，则队列和堆栈非常有用;也就是说，当你可能想要在检索元素值后丢弃该元素时。Queues and stacks are useful when you need temporary storage for information; that is, when you might want to discard an element after retrieving its value. 如果需要以存储在集合中的相同顺序访问信息，请使用 。Use if you need to access the information in the same order that it is stored in the collection. 如果需要按相反的顺序访问该信息，请使用 。Use if you need to access the information in reverse order. 如果需要从多个线程同时访问集合，请使用 或 。Use or if you need to access the collection from multiple threads concurrently. 可对 及其元素执行三个主要操作：Three main operations can be performed on a and its elements: - 在 的末尾添加一个元素。 adds an element to the end of the . - 从 的开头删除最旧的元素。 removes the oldest element from the start of the . - 返回位于 开头的最早元素，但不会将其从 中删除。 returns the oldest element that is at the start of the but does not remove it from the . 的容量是 可以容纳的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 将元素添加到 时，会根据需要通过重新分配来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 可以通过调用 来减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 增长系数是在需要更大容量时，当前容量乘以的数值。The growth factor is the number by which the current capacity is multiplied when a greater capacity is required. 增长因子是在构造 时确定的。The growth factor is determined when the is constructed. 默认增长系数为2.0。The default growth factor is 2.0. 无论增长系数如何， 的容量将始终至少增加四个。The capacity of the will always increase by at least a minimum of four, regardless of the growth factor. 例如，如果需要更大的容量，则增长系数为1.0 的 将始终增加四个容量。For example, a with a growth factor of 1.0 will always increase in capacity by four when a greater capacity is required. 接受 `null` 作为有效值，并允许重复元素。 accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements. 有关此集合的泛型版本，请参阅 For the generic version of this collection, see ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建值并将其添加到 以及如何打印出其值。The following example shows how to create and add values to a and how to print out its values. [!code-cpp[Classic Queue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此类型的公共静态（ Visual Basic）成员是线程安全的。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 若要保证 的线程安全，必须通过 方法返回的包装完成所有操作。

span.span: To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量是 可以容纳的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 将元素添加到 时，会根据需要通过重新分配来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 可以通过调用 来减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 增长系数是在需要更大容量时，当前容量乘以的数值。The growth factor is the number by which the current capacity is multiplied when a greater capacity is required. 增长因子是在构造 时确定的。The growth factor is determined when the is constructed. 此构造函数是一个 `O(1)` 操作。This constructor is an `O(1)` operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量是 可以容纳的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 将元素添加到 时，会根据需要通过重新分配来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 可以通过调用 来减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 增长系数是在需要更大容量时，当前容量乘以的数值。The growth factor is the number by which the current capacity is multiplied when a greater capacity is required. 增长因子是在构造 时确定的。The growth factor is determined when the is constructed. 如果集合的大小可为估算值，则指定初始容量就无需在将元素添加到 时执行多个大小调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 此构造函数是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 `capacity`的。This constructor is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is `capacity`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量是 可以容纳的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 将元素添加到 时，会根据需要通过重新分配来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 可以通过调用 来减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 增长系数是在需要更大容量时，当前容量乘以的数值。The growth factor is the number by which the current capacity is multiplied when a greater capacity is required. 增长因子是在构造 时确定的。The growth factor is determined when the is constructed. 无论增长系数如何， 的容量将始终按最小值增加;1.0 的增长系数不会阻止 大小增加。The capacity of the will always increase by a minimum value, regardless of the growth factor; a growth factor of 1.0 will not prevent the from increasing in size. 如果集合的大小可为估算值，则指定初始容量就无需在将元素添加到 时执行多个大小调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 此构造函数是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 `capacity`的。This constructor is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is `capacity`.

summary.span: 创建 的浅表副本。

span.span: Creates a shallow copy of the .
A shallow copy of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合的浅表副本仅复制集合的元素，无论它们是引用类型还是值类型，但不复制引用引用的对象。A shallow copy of a collection copies only the elements of the collection, whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to. 新集合中的引用指向原始集合中的引用所指向的相同对象。The references in the new collection point to the same objects that the references in the original collection point to. 与此相反，集合的深层副本会复制元素以及元素直接或间接引用的所有内容。In contrast, a deep copy of a collection copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 此方法是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 的。This method is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通过调用 确定相等性。This method determines equality by calling . 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 的。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is . 从 .NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象的 并在 `obj` 上 方法来确定 `item` 是否存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection's objects' and methods on `obj` to determine whether `item` exists. 在 .NET Framework 的早期版本中，此决定是使用集合中对象上的 `obj` 参数的 和 方法进行的。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `obj` parameter on the objects in the collection.

summary.span: 获取 中包含的元素数。

span.span: Gets the number of elements contained in the .
The number of elements contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量是 可存储的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can store. 是实际处于 中的元素的数目。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 的容量始终大于或等于 。The capacity of a is always greater than or equal to . 如果在添加元素时 超过容量，则会自动重新分配内部数组，然后再复制旧元素并添加新元素，从而自动增加容量。If exceeds the capacity while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 新容量由当前容量乘以增长系数来确定，这是在构造 时确定的。The new capacity is determined by multiplying the current capacity by the growth factor, which is determined when the is constructed. 无论增长系数如何， 的容量将始终按最小值增加;1.0 的增长系数不会阻止 大小增加。The capacity of the will always increase by a minimum value, regardless of the growth factor; a growth factor of 1.0 will not prevent the from increasing in size. 可以通过调用 来减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 检索此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation.

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位到集合中的最后一个元素之后， 返回 `false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对 的后续调用也将返回 `false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果对的最后一个调用 返回 `false`，则 未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法是一个 `O(1)` 操作。This method is an `O(1)` operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（确保线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要保证 的线程安全，必须通过 方法返回的包装完成所有操作。To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. 检索此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation. [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示如何同步 、确定 是否同步以及使用同步 。The following example shows how to synchronize a , determine if a is synchronized, and use a synchronized . [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回位于 开始处的对象但不将其移除。

span.span: Returns the object at the beginning of the without removing it.

returns.span: 位于 的开头的对象。

span.span: The object at the beginning of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法类似于 方法，但 不修改 。This method is similar to the method, but does not modify the . `null` 可以作为值添加到 中。`null` can be added to the as a value. 若要区分 null 值和 的末尾，请检查 属性或捕获 ，当 为空时，将引发该异常。To distinguish between a null value and the end of the , check the property or catch the , which is thrown when the is empty. 此方法是一个 `O(1)` 操作。This method is an `O(1)` operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将元素添加到 、从 中删除元素或在 的开头查看元素。The following example shows how to add elements to the , remove elements from the , or view the element at the beginning of the . [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.Enqueue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.Enqueue Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.Enqueue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.Enqueue Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.Enqueue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.Enqueue Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Shared Function Synchronized (queue As Queue) As Queue

span.span: The to synchronize.

summary.span: 返回将包装原始队列并且是线程安全的新的 。

span.span: Returns a new that wraps the original queue, and is thread safe.

returns.span: 同步的（线程安全） 包装。

span.span: A wrapper that is synchronized (thread safe).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的包装器将在操作执行前锁定队列，以便以线程安全的方式执行此操作。The wrapper returned by this method locks the queue before an operation is performed so that it is performed in a thread-safe manner. 为了保证 的线程安全，所有操作都必须仅通过此包装器完成。To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through this wrapper only. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. 此方法是一个 `O(1)` 操作。This method is an `O(1)` operation. [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示如何同步 ，确定 是否同步并使用同步 。The following example shows how to synchronize a , determine if a is synchronized and use a synchronized . [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建 的同步版本，请使用 方法。To create a synchronized version of the , use the method. 但是，派生类可以使用 属性提供其自己的 的同步版本。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步代码必须对 的 执行操作，而不是直接在 上执行操作。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它与可能同时修改 对象的其他线程保持正确的同步。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. 检索此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation. [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)]

summary.span: 将 元素复制到新数组。

span.span: Copies the elements to a new array.

returns.span: 包含从 复制的元素的新数组。

span.span: A new array containing elements copied from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会修改 。The is not modified. 新数组中元素的顺序与从 开头到末尾的元素的顺序相同。The order of the elements in the new array is the same as the order of the elements from the beginning of the to its end. 此方法是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 的。This method is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 复制到一维数组中。The following example shows how to copy a into a one-dimensional array. summary.span: 将容量设置为 中元素的实际数目。

span.span: Sets the capacity to the actual number of elements in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不向队列中添加新的元素，则可以使用此方法最大程度地减少队列的内存开销。This method can be used to minimize a queue's memory overhead if no new elements will be added to the queue. 若要将 重置为其初始状态，请在调用 之前调用 方法。To reset a to its initial state, call the method before calling . 修整空 会将 的容量设置为默认容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity. 此方法是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 的。This method is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is .

span.span: The is read-only.
